title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.02 - City of Niagara Falls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.02 - City of Niagara Falls

State Regulations
(a) Route
384. The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 384 between Exit N-21 of
IR 190 and 10th Street. (b) Allen

Avenue between 27th Street and 24th Street. (c) 27th Street. The northbound roadway of
27th Street between Route 384 and Allen Avenue. (d) 24th Street. The southbound roadway of
24th Street between Route 384 and Allen Avenue. (e) 47th Street. The northbound and
southbound roadways of 47th Street between Route 62 and Royal Avenue. (f) Simmons Street. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Simmons Street between 47th Street and its
terminus. (g) Route 62. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 62 between IR 190 and Packard

Road. (h) Packard Road. The
northeastbound and southwestbound roadways of Parkard Road between Route 62 and

Route 384. (i) [Eff. until March
22, 1989, see subd. (i) below.]
Highland Avenue. Highland Avenue between Route 31 and a point 0.3+- mile south
of Route 31. (i) [Eff. March 22, 1989, see subd. (i) above.]
Highland Avenue. Highland Avenue between Maple Street and a point 0.3 mile
south of Route 31. (j) Route 62A
(Pine Avenue). Route 62A (Pine Avenue) between US Route 62 and Route
104. (k) Portage Road. Portage Road
between Route 62A (Pine Avenue) and Route 104. (l) US Route 62 (Pine Avenue). US Route 62
(Pine Avenue) between I-190 and Route 265 (Military Road). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8129.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
